New Zealand households lose $47b in net worth, face highest home loan interest costs https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-zealand-households-lose-47b-in-net-worth-face-highest-home-loan-interest-costs/LTSRFSRM55HRRFTURIRU37YRPE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-zealand-households-lose-47b-in-net-worth-face-highest-home-loan-interest-costs/LTSRFSRM55HRRFTURIRU37YRPE/ NZ households spent $479m more than they earned, losing $47b in net worth in June quarter. Thu, 10 Oct 2024 04:06:21 +0000 Seasonally adjusted, spending was up 1% to $60 billion, driven by spending on services and non-durable goods like groceries. Photo / 123RF
